page.title: 20CREDITS AND ACKNOWLEDGEMENTS
page.content: All of those who have worked on the Domesday Project over the past few months have felt very priviledged to be part of a large team. It has been hard but enjoyable work. As organiser of the 12 squares I would like to thank all the children and their teachers of the 3 schools who took part and collected all the relevant information. There are obviously too many to mention by name here. Thanks too to the many adults who provided information to all the questions asked of them in the survey. Special thanks to Mrs Yvonne Pitt who took all the photographs and provided a great deal of all the background information concernced. D.Watkins (July 1985)
